arr: ZigBee Gateway + ZigBee Controller with Power Metering SAC823 +ZigBee Motion sensor 712
Could be controlled by APP, and the microwave group stars all day
This is a retrofit project. With microwave group function, any motion sensor in this Gym senses any movement, all the lamps light on aytomatically, until people left.
Educational Institution, Gym, Library, Entertainment, Exhibition hall
